sjDescription.message: Controlla quali script, frame e connessioni websocket i siti possono caricare.

scopePage.description: Scope where the rules will be applied. Shown on popup first line.

scopeSite.description: Scope where the rules will be applied. Shown on popup first line.

scopeDomain.description: Scope where the rules will be applied. Shown on popup first line.

scopeGlobal.description: Scope where the rules will be applied. Shown on popup first line.

policyBlockAll.description: Policy applied on level. Shown in popup second line & multiple other areas in settings.

policyFiltered.description: Policy applied on level. Shown in popup second line & multiple other areas in settings.

policyRelaxed.description: Policy applied on level. Shown in popup second line & multiple other areas in settings.

policyAllowAll.description: Policy applied on level. Shown in popup second line & multiple other areas in settings.

policyAllowOnce.message: Ricarica e Permetti tutto questa volta
policyAllowOnce.description: Tooltip in popup second line, last button.

policyAllowOnceDisable.message: Ricarica e Torna alle impostazioni normali
policyAllowOnceDisable.description: Tooltip in popup second line, last button when Allow Once is enabled.

errorFTP.message: Le pagine FTP non sono scansionate
errorFTP.description: Error message when opening the popup from an invalid page. FTP is a protocol, like http, and so this error tells that pages generated from FTP are ignored. Reason: FTP pages are generated by Chromium and so can't contain any of those files

errorFile.message: I file locali non sono scansionati
errorFile.description: Error message when opening the popup from an invalid page. Reason: No support yet.

errorInternal.message: Le pagine interne non sono scansionate
errorInternal.description: Error message when opening the popup from an invalid page. Reason: Internal pages can't be accessed by the API.

seeResources.message: Clicca per vedere l'elenco degli script, frame o delle connessioni websocket
seeResources.description: Hover number at the right of domain name in popup.

tooltipSettings.description: Hover tooltip for last button of the first line in popup.

settingsProject.description: Hover tooltip for GitHub button at top right. Opens project homepage.

settingsRulesNone.description: When a rule has no rule, rule is under a lower level.

settingsRulesWhite.description: When a rule is to whitelist.

settingsManage.description: Settings title. Keep consistent with tooltipSettings.

settingsManageExportTooltip.message: Le impostazioni saranno esportate nell'area di testo in basso.

settingsManageResetTooltip.message: Non c'è nessun dialogo di conferma e non si torna indietro! Esportare le tue impostazioni, se lo vuoi!

settingsManageImportTooltip.message: Incolla le vecchie impostazioni nell'area di testo in basso e dopo premi questo pulsante.

settingsManagePlaceholder.description: Text in text box to explain how to import.

settingsNumScripts.message: Regole dello script in questo livello
settingsNumScripts.description: Tooltip in number square. Shows how many scripts are allowed or blocked in this level.

settingsNumLevels.description: Tooltip in number square. Shows how many rules for a more specific scope exist under that level. E.g. number of sub-domain specific rules exist under a domain rule.

settingsTitle.description: Page/tab title. Keep consistent with tooltipSettings

tooltipWebsockets.description: Hover number or icon in popup.

tooltipFrames.description: Hover number or icon in popup.

tooltipScripts.description: Hover number or icon in popup.

updateTitle.description: Title of the notification when an update is available.

updateMessage.message:
La versione $version$ è disponibile
Stai usando la versione $oldVersion$
updateMessage.description: Message of the notification when an update is available.

version.description: Don't change. Replaced by version available to download.

oldVersion.description: Don't change. Replaced by currently installed version.

updateContext.message: Clicca qui per aprire la pagina da cui scaricarlo
updateContext.description: Presentation varies according to OS, but purpose is to explain what action will happen when clicking on the notification.
